AAA.name: Goods description
AAA.desc:
[7002] Plain language description of the nature of the goods
                                    sufficient to identify them at the level required for banking, Customs, statistical
                                    or transport purposes, avoiding unnecessary detail (Generic term).

AAB.name: Terms of payments
AAB.desc:
[4276] Conditions of payment between the parties to a transaction
                                    (generic term).

AAD.name: Dangerous goods, technical name
AAD.desc:
Proper shipping name, supplemented as necessary with the correct
                                    technical name, by which a dangerous substance or article may be correctly
                                    identified or which is sufficiently informative to permit identification by
                                    reference to generally available literature.

AAG.name: Party instructions
AAG.desc:
Indicates that the segment contains instructions to be passed on to
                                    the identified party.

AAH.name: Customs information
AAH.desc: [4034] Information entered by Customs on the CIM.

AAJ.name: Additional conditions of sale/purchase
AAJ.desc: Additional conditions specific to this order or project.

AAK.name: Price conditions
AAK.desc: Information on the price conditions that are expected or given.

AAL.name: Goods dimensions in characters
AAL.desc: Expression of a number in characters as length of ten meters.

AAM.name: Equipment re-usage restrictions
AAM.desc:
Technical or commercial reasons why a piece of equipment may not be
                                    re-used after the current transport terminates.

AAN.name: Handling restriction
AAN.desc:
Restrictions in handling depending on the technical characteristics of
                                    the piece of equipment or on the nature of the goods.

AAO.name: Error description (free text)
AAO.desc: Error described by a free text.

AAP.name: Response (free text)
AAP.desc: Free text of the response to a communication.

AAQ.name: Package content's description
AAQ.desc: A description of the contents of a package.

AAR.name: Terms of delivery
AAR.desc:
(4053) Free text of the non Incoterms terms of delivery. For
                                    Incoterms, use: 4053.

AAS.name: Bill of lading remarks
AAS.desc: The remarks printed or to be printed on a bill of lading.

AAT.name: Mode of settlement information
AAT.desc:
Free text information on an IATA Air Waybill to indicate means by
                                    which account is to be settled.

AAU.name: Consignment invoice information
AAU.desc: Information pertaining to the invoice covering the consignment.

AAV.name: Clearance invoice information
AAV.desc: Information pertaining to the invoice covering clearance of the cargo.

AAW.name: Letter of credit information
AAW.desc: Information pertaining to the letter of credit.

AAZ.name: Additional export information
AAZ.desc: The text contains additional export information.

ABA.name: Tariff statements
ABA.desc: Description of parameters relating to a tariff.

ABB.name: Medical history
ABB.desc: Historical details of a patients medical events.

ABC.name: Conditions of sale or purchase
ABC.desc:
Additional information regarding terms and conditions which apply to
                                    the transaction.

ABD.name: Nature of transaction
ABD.desc:
An indication for customs of the type of contract under which goods
                                    are supplied.

ABE.name: Additional terms and/or conditions (documentary credit)
ABE.desc: Additional terms and/or conditions to the documentary credit.

ABF.name: Instructions or information about standby documentary credit
ABF.desc: Instruction or information about a standby documentary credit.

ABG.name: Instructions or information about partial shipment(s)
ABG.desc: Instructions or information about partial shipment(s).

ABI.name: Additional handling instructions documentary credit
ABI.desc: Additional handling instructions for a documentary credit.

ABK.name: Chargeable category of equipment
ABK.desc: Equipment types are coded by category for financial purposes.

ABM.name: Onward routing information
ABM.desc: The text contains onward routing information.

ABN.name: Accounting information
ABN.desc: The text contains information related to accounting.

ABO.name: Discrepancy information
ABO.desc: Free text or coded information to indicate a specific discrepancy.

ABQ.name: Method of issuance
ABQ.desc: Method of issuance of documentary credit.

ABR.name: Documents delivery instructions
ABR.desc:
Delivery instructions for documents required under a documentary
                                    credit.

ABS.name: Additional conditions
ABS.desc: Additional conditions to the issuance of a documentary credit.

ABZ.name: Instructions/information about revolving documentary credit
ABZ.desc: Instructions/information about a revolving documentary credit.

ACC.name: Factor assignment clause
ACC.desc: Assignment based on an agreement between seller and factor.

ACD.name: Reason
ACD.desc: Reason for a request or response.

ACE.name: Dispute
ACE.desc:
A notice, usually from buyer to seller, that something was found wrong
                                    with goods delivered or the services rendered, or with the related invoice.

ACF.name: Additional attribute information
ACF.desc:
The text refers to information about an additional attribute not
                                    otherwise specified.

ACG.name: Absence declaration
ACG.desc: A declaration on the reason of the absence.

ACH.name: Aggregation statement
ACH.desc:
A statement on the way a specific variable or set of variables has
                                    been aggregated.

ACI.name: Compilation statement
ACI.desc:
A statement on the compilation status of an array or other set of
                                    figures or calculations.

ACJ.name: Definitional exception
ACJ.desc:
An exception to the agreed definition of a term, concept, formula or
                                    other object.

ACK.name: Privacy statement
ACK.desc: A statement on the privacy or confidential nature of an object.

ACL.name: Quality statement
ACL.desc: A statement on the quality of an object.

ACM.name: Statistical description
ACM.desc:
The description of a statistical object such as a value list, concept,
                                    or structure definition.

ACN.name: Statistical definition
ACN.desc:
The definition of a statistical object such as a value list, concept,
                                    or structure definition.

ACO.name: Statistical name
ACO.desc:
The name of a statistical object such as a value list, concept or
                                    structure definition.

ACP.name: Statistical title
ACP.desc:
The title of a statistical object such as a value list, concept, or
                                    structure definition.

ACQ.name: Off-dimension information
ACQ.desc:
Information relating to differences between the actual transport
                                    dimensions and the normally applicable dimensions.

ACR.name: Unexpected stops information
ACR.desc: Information relating to unexpected stops during a conveyance.

ACS.name: Principles
ACS.desc:
Text subject is principles section of the UN/EDIFACT rules for
                                    presentation of standardized message and directories documentation.

ACT.name: Terms and definition
ACT.desc:
Text subject is terms and definition section of the UN/EDIFACT rules
                                    for presentation of standardized message and directories documentation.

ACV.name: Simple data element name
ACV.desc: Text subject is name of simple data element.

ACW.name: Scope
ACW.desc:
Text subject is scope section of the UN/EDIFACT rules for presentation
                                    of standardized message and directories documentation.

ACX.name: Message type name
ACX.desc: Text subject is name of message type.

ACY.name: Introduction
ACY.desc:
Text subject is introduction section of the UN/EDIFACT rules for
                                    presentation of standardized message and directories documentation.

ACZ.name: Glossary
ACZ.desc:
Text subject is glossary section of the UN/EDIFACT rules for
                                    presentation of standardized message and directories documentation.

ADA.name: Functional definition
ADA.desc:
Text subject is functional definition section of the UN/EDIFACT rules
                                    for presentation of standardized message and directories documentation.

ADB.name: Examples
ADB.desc:
Text subject is examples as given in the example(s) section of the
                                    UN/EDIFACT rules for presentation of standardized message and directories
                                    documentation.

ADC.name: Cover page
ADC.desc:
Text subject is cover page of the UN/EDIFACT rules for presentation of
                                    standardized message and directories documentation.

ADD.name: Dependency (syntax) notes
ADD.desc: Denotes that the associated text is a dependency (syntax) note.

ADE.name: Code value name
ADE.desc: Text subject is name of code value.

ADF.name: Code list name
ADF.desc: Text subject is name of code list.

ADG.name: Clarification of usage
ADG.desc:
Text subject is an explanation of the intended usage of a segment or
                                    segment group.

ADH.name: Composite data element name
ADH.desc: Text subject is name of composite data element.

ADI.name: Field of application
ADI.desc:
Text subject is field of application of the UN/EDIFACT rules for
                                    presentation of standardized message and directories documentation.

ADJ.name: Type of assets and liabilities
ADJ.desc: Information describing the type of assets and liabilities.

ADK.name: Promotion information
ADK.desc: The text contains information about a promotion.

ADL.name: Meter condition
ADL.desc: Description of the condition of a meter.

ADM.name: Meter reading information
ADM.desc: Information related to a particular reading of a meter.

ADN.name: Type of transaction reason
ADN.desc: Information describing the type of the reason of transaction.

ADP.name: Carrier's agent counter information
ADP.desc: Information for use at the counter of the carrier's agent.

ADQ.name: Description of work item on equipment
ADQ.desc: Description or code for the operation to be executed on the equipment.

ADS.name: Booked item information
ADS.desc: Information pertaining to a booked item.

ADT.name: Source of document
ADT.desc: Text subject is source of document.

ADV.name: Fixed part of segment clarification text
ADV.desc: Text subject is fixed part of segment clarification text.

ADW.name: Characteristics of goods
ADW.desc:
Description of the characteristics of goods in addition to the
                                    description of the goods [7002].

ADX.name: Additional discharge instructions
ADX.desc: Special discharge instructions concerning the goods.

ADY.name: Container stripping instructions
ADY.desc: Instructions regarding the stripping of container(s).

ADZ.name: CSC (Container Safety Convention) plate information
ADZ.desc:
Information on the CSC (Container Safety Convention) plate that is
                                    attached to the container.

AEB.name: Temperature control instructions
AEB.desc: Instruction regarding the temperature control of the cargo.

AEC.name: Text refers to expected data
AEC.desc: Remarks refer to data that was expected.

AED.name: Text refers to received data
AED.desc: Remarks refer to data that was received.

AEE.name: Section clarification text
AEE.desc: Text subject is section clarification text.

AEK.name: Take off annotation
AEK.desc:
Additional information in plain text to support a take off annotation.
                                    Taking off is the process of assessing the quantity work from extracting the
                                    measurement from construction documentation.

AEL.name: Price variation narrative
AEL.desc: Additional information in plain language to support a price variation.

AEN.name: Standard method narrative
AEN.desc: Additional information in plain language to support a standard method.

AEO.name: Project narrative
AEO.desc: Additional information in plain language to support the project.

AEP.name: Radioactive goods, additional information
AEP.desc: Additional information related to radioactive goods.

AEQ.name: Bank-to-bank information
AEQ.desc: Information given from one bank to another.

AES.name: Reason for amending a message
AES.desc: Identification of the reason for amending a message.

AET.name: Instructions to the paying and/or accepting and/or negotiating bank
AET.desc: Instructions to the paying and/or accepting and/or negotiating bank.

AEX.name: Instructions to the collecting bank
AEX.desc:
Instructions to the bank, other than the remitting bank, involved in
                                    processing the collection.

AEZ.name: Internal auditing information
AEZ.desc: Text relating to internal auditing information.

AFA.name: Constraint
AFA.desc: Denotes that the associated text is a constraint.

AFB.name: Comment
AFB.desc: Denotes that the associated text is a comment.

AFC.name: Semantic note
AFC.desc: Denotes that the associated text is a semantic note.

AFD.name: Help text
AFD.desc: Denotes that the associated text is an item of help text.

AFE.name: Legend
AFE.desc: Denotes that the associated text is a legend.

AFF.name: Batch code structure
AFF.desc: A description of the structure of a batch code.

AFG.name: Product application
AFG.desc: A general description of the application of a product.

AFK.name: Repair description
AFK.desc: The description of the work performed during the repair.

AFM.name: Title
AFM.desc: Denotes that the associated text is a title.

AFN.name: Description of amount
AFN.desc: An amount description in clear text.

AFQ.name: Purchase region
AFQ.desc: Information concerning the region(s) where purchases are made.

AFR.name: Affiliation
AFR.desc:
Information concerning an association of one party with another
                                    party(ies).

AFT.name: Line of business
AFT.desc: Information concerning an entity's line of business.

AFU.name: Financial institution
AFU.desc: Description of financial institution(s) used by an entity.

AFX.name: Banking arrangements
AFX.desc: Information concerning the general banking arrangements.

AGA.name: Business financing details
AGA.desc: Details about the financing of the business.

AGD.name: Construction specialty
AGD.desc: Information concerning the line of business of a construction entity.

AGJ.name: Conviction details
AGJ.desc: Details about the law or penal codes that resulted in conviction.

AGV.name: Long term debt
AGV.desc: Description of the long term debt.

AGX.name: Current legal structure
AGX.desc: Details on the current legal structure.

AHD.name: Original legal structure
AHD.desc: Information concerning the original legal structure.

AHE.name: Employee sharing arrangements
AHE.desc:
Information describing how a company uses employees from another
                                    company.

AHF.name: Organization details
AHF.desc: Description about the organization of a company.

AHH.name: Price range
AHH.desc: Information concerning the price range of products made or sold.

AHI.name: Qualifications
AHI.desc: Information on the accomplishments fitting a party for a position.

AHK.name: Criminal sentence
AHK.desc: Description of the sentence imposed in a criminal proceeding.

AHM.name: Educational institution information
AHM.desc: Free form description relating to the school(s) attended.

AHQ.name: Educational degree information
AHQ.desc: Details about the educational degree received from a school.

AHT.name: Accountant's comments
AHT.desc: Comments made by an accountant regarding a financial statement.

AHU.name: Exemption law location
AHU.desc: Description of the exemption provided to a location by a law.

AHV.name: Share classifications
AHV.desc: Information about the classes or categories of shares.

AHX.name: Event location
AHX.desc: Description of the location of an event.

AHY.name: Facility occupancy
AHY.desc: Information related to occupancy of a facility.

AHZ.name: Import and export details
AHZ.desc:
Specific information provided about the importation and exportation of
                                    goods.

AIB.name: Inventory value
AIB.desc: Description of the value of inventory.

AIC.name: Education
AIC.desc: Description of the education of a person.

AID.name: Event
AID.desc: Description of a thing that happens or takes place.

AIE.name: Agent
AIE.desc: Information about agents the entity uses.

AIF.name: Domestically agreed financial statement details
AIF.desc: Details of domestically agreed financial statement.

AII.name: Former business activity
AII.desc: Description of the former line of business.

AIJ.name: Trade name use
AIJ.desc: Description of how a trading name is used.

AIM.name: Holding company operation
AIM.desc: Description of the operation of a holding company.

AIN.name: Consignment routing
AIN.desc: Information on routing of the consignment.

AIO.name: Letter of protest
AIO.desc: A letter citing any condition in dispute.

AIQ.name: Party information
AIQ.desc: Free text information related to a party.

AIR.name: Area boundaries description
AIR.desc: Description of the boundaries of a geographical area.

AIS.name: Advertisement information
AIS.desc: The free text contains advertisement information.

AIT.name: Financial statement details
AIT.desc: Details regarding the financial statement in free text.

AIU.name: Access instructions
AIU.desc: Description of how to access an entity.

AIW.name: Credit line
AIW.desc: Description of the line of credit available to an entity.

AIX.name: Warranty terms
AIX.desc:
Text describing the terms of warranty which apply to a product or
                                    service.

AIY.name: Division description
AIY.desc: Plain language description of a division of an entity.

AJB.name: Laboratory result
AJB.desc: The result of a laboratory investigation.

ALD.name: X-ray result
ALD.desc: The result of an X-ray examination.

ALE.name: Pathology result
ALE.desc: The result of a pathology investigation.

ALH.name: Medical treatment course detail
ALH.desc: Details of a course of medical treatment.

ALL.name: All documents
ALL.desc: The note implies to all documents.

ALN.name: Medicine dosage and administration
ALN.desc: Details of medicine dosage and method of administration.

ALO.name: Availability of patient
ALO.desc: Details of when and/or where the patient is available.

ALP.name: Reason for service request
ALP.desc: Details of the reason for a requested service.

ALQ.name: Purpose of service
ALQ.desc: Details of the purpose of a service.

ARR.name: Arrival conditions
ARR.desc: Conditions under which arrival takes place.

ARS.name: Service requester's comment
ARS.desc: Comment by the requester of a service.

AUT.name: Authentication
AUT.desc: Name, code, password etc. given for authentication purposes.

AUU.name: Requested location description
AUU.desc: The description of the location requested.

AUV.name: Medicine administration condition
AUV.desc:
The event or condition that initiates the administration of a single
                                    dose of medicine or a period of treatment.

AUX.name: Precautionary measure
AUX.desc: Action to be taken to avert possible harmful affects.

AUY.name: Service characteristic
AUY.desc: Free text description is related to a service characteristic.

AUZ.name: Planned event comment
AUZ.desc: Comment about an event that is planned.

AVB.name: Transport requirements comment
AVB.desc: Comment about the requirements for transport.

BLC.name: Bill of lading clause
BLC.desc: Clause on the bill of lading regarding the cargo being shipped.

BLD.name: Instruction to prepare the patient
BLD.desc: Instruction with the purpose of preparing the patient.

BLF.name: Examination result comment
BLF.desc: Comment about the result of an examination.

BLH.name: Prescription reason
BLH.desc: Details of the reason for a prescription.

BLK.name: Medicinal specification comment
BLK.desc: Comment concerning the specification of a medicinal product.

BLM.name: Status of a plan
BLM.desc: Comment about the status of a plan.

BLN.name: Random sample test information
BLN.desc: Information regarding a random sample test.

BLO.name: Period of time
BLO.desc: Text subject is a period of time.

BLR.name: Transport document remarks
BLR.desc:
Remarks concerning the complete consignment to be printed on the bill
                                    of lading.

CCI.name: Customs clearance instructions
CCI.desc:
Any coded or clear instruction agreed by customer and carrier
                                    regarding the declaration of the goods.

CEX.name: Customs clearance instructions export
CEX.desc:
Any coded or clear instruction agreed by customer and carrier
                                    regarding the export declaration of the goods.

CIP.name: Customs clearance instruction import
CIP.desc:
Any coded or clear instruction agreed by customer and carrier
                                    regarding the import declaration of the goods.

CLP.name: Clearance place requested
CLP.desc:
Name of the place where Customs clearance is asked to be executed as
                                    requested by the consignee/consignor.

CLR.name: Loading remarks
CLR.desc: Instructions concerning the loading of the container.

COI.name: Order information
COI.desc: Additional information related to an order.

CUR.name: Customer remarks
CUR.desc: Remarks from or for a supplier of goods or services.

DAR.name: Damage remarks
DAR.desc: Remarks concerning damage on the cargo.

DCL.name: Declaration
DCL.desc:
[4020] Text of a declaration made by the issuer of the document (CIM
                                    12).

DIN.name: Delivery instructions
DIN.desc: Instructions regarding the delivery of the cargo.

DUT.name: Duty declaration
DUT.desc: The text contains a statement constituting a duty declaration.

EUR.name: Effective used routing
EUR.desc:
Physical route effectively used for the movement of the means of
                                    transport.

FBC.name: First block to be printed on the transport contract
FBC.desc: The first block of text to be printed on the transport contract.

GBL.name: Government bill of lading information
GBL.desc:
Free text information on a transport document to indicate payment
                                    information by Government Bill of Lading.

GEN.name: Entire transaction set
GEN.desc: Note is general in nature, applies to entire transaction segment.

GS7.name: Further information concerning GGVS par. 7
GS7.desc:
Special permission for road transport of certain goods in the German
                                    dangerous goods regulation for road transport.

HAN.name: Handling instructions
HAN.desc:
[4078] Instructions on how specified goods, packages or containers
                                    should be handled.

ICN.name: Information for consignee
ICN.desc: [4070] Any remark given for the information of the consignee (CIM 21).

IMI.name: Invoice mailing instructions
IMI.desc:
Instructions as to which freight and charges components have to be
                                    mailed to whom.

IND.name: Commercial invoice item description
IND.desc: Free text describing goods on a commercial invoice line.

IRP.name: Information for railway purpose
IRP.desc:
[4090] Date entered by railway stations when required, e.g. specified
                                    trains, additional sheets for freight calculations, special measures, etc. (CIM 8).

ITR.name: Inland transport details
ITR.desc:
Information concerning the pre-carriage to the port of discharge if by
                                    other means than a vessel.

ITS.name: Testing instructions
ITS.desc:
Instructions regarding the testing that is required to be carried out
                                    on the items in the transaction.

LOI.name: Loading instruction
LOI.desc:
Instructions where specified packages or containers are to be loaded
                                    on a means of transport.

MCO.name: Miscellaneous charge order
MCO.desc:
Free text accounting information on an IATA Air Waybill to indicate
                                    payment information by Miscellaneous charge order.

MKS.name: Additional marks/numbers information
MKS.desc: Additional information regarding the marks and numbers.

OSI.name: Other service information
OSI.desc:
General information created by the sender of general or specific
                                    value.

PAC.name: Packing/marking information
PAC.desc: Information regarding the packaging and/or marking of goods.

PAI.name: Payment instructions information
PAI.desc:
The free text contains payment instructions information relevant to
                                    the message.

PKT.name: Packaging terms information
PKT.desc: The text contains packaging terms information.

PMD.name: Payment detail/remittance information
PMD.desc: The free text contains payment details.

PRF.name: Price calculation formula
PRF.desc:
Additional information regarding the price formula used for
                                    calculating the item price.

QIN.name: Quarantine instructions
QIN.desc:
Instructions regarding quarantine, i.e. the period during which an
                                    arriving vessel, including its equipment, cargo, crew or passengers, suspected to
                                    carry or carrying a contagious disease is detained in strict isolation to prevent
                                    the spread of such a disease.

QQD.name: Quality demands/requirements
QQD.desc:
Specification of the quality/performance expectations or standards to
                                    which the items must conform.

RAH.name: Risk and handling information
RAH.desc:
Information concerning risks induced by the goods and/or handling
                                    instruction.

REG.name: Regulatory information
REG.desc: The free text contains information for regulatory authority.

RET.name: Return to origin information
RET.desc:
Free text information on an IATA Air Waybill to indicate consignment
                                    returned because of non delivery.

RQR.name: Requested routes/routing instructions
RQR.desc:
[3074] Names of places via which the consignor requests a consignment
                                    to be routed.

RQT.name: Tariffs and route requested
RQT.desc:
[4120] Stipulation of the tariffs to be applied showing, where
                                    applicable, special-agreement numbers or references; indication of routes by
                                    frontier points or by frontier stations and, when necessary, by transit stations
                                    between.

SIC.name: Sender's instruction to carrier
SIC.desc:
[4284] Instructions given and declarations made by the sender to the
                                    carrier concerning Customs, insurance, and other formalities.

SIN.name: Special instructions
SIN.desc:
Special instructions like licence no, high value, handle with care,
                                    glass.

SLR.name: Ship line requested
SLR.desc:
Shipping line requested to be used for traffic between European
                                    continent and U.K. for Ireland.

SPA.name: Special permission for transport, generally
SPA.desc:
Statement that a special permission has been obtained for the
                                    transport (and/or routing) in general, and reference to such permission.

SPG.name: Special permission concerning the goods to be transported
SPG.desc:
Statement that a special permission has been obtained for the
                                    transport (and/or routing) of the goods specified, and reference to such permission.

SPP.name: Special permission concerning package
SPP.desc:
Statement that a special permission has been obtained for the
                                    packaging, and reference to such permission.

SPT.name: Special permission concerning transport means
SPT.desc:
Statement that a special permission has been obtained for the use of
                                    the means transport, and reference to such permission.

SRN.name: Subsidiary risk number (IATA/DGR)
SRN.desc:
Number(s) of subsidiary risks, induced by the goods, according to the
                                    valid classification.

SSR.name: Special service request
SSR.desc: Request for a special service concerning the transport of the goods.

SUR.name: Supplier remarks
SUR.desc: Remarks from or for a supplier of goods or services.

TDT.name: Transport details remarks
TDT.desc: Additional information related to transport details.

TRA.name: Transportation information
TRA.desc: General information regarding the transport of the cargo.

TRR.name: Requested tariff
TRR.desc:
Stipulation of the tariffs to be applied showing, where applicable,
                                    special agreement numbers or references.

TXD.name: Tax declaration
TXD.desc: The text contains a statement constituting a tax declaration.

ZZZ.name: Mutually defined
ZZZ.desc: Note contains information mutually defined by trading partners.
